anime.title: Frieren: Beyond Journey's End
anime.description: The mage Frieren defeated the Demon King alongside the hero Himmel's party after a 10-year quest. Folk magic, demons, and a long life await her.

manga.title: Berserk
manga.description: Guts, known as the Black Swordsman, seeks sanctuary from the demonic forces that pursue him and his woman, and vengeance against the man who branded him as an unholy sacrifice.
